main event: A police officer reported seeing a luminous disc-shaped object in Killeen, Texas on October 8, 1954.
interesting points: The object was approximately 25-30 feet in diameter and white in color,It was observed crossing a road, changing direction, and then disappearing,The object was reported to have a speed of approximately 500 mph,The officer observed the object for about 2-3 minutes during clear weather,The report was filed with local authorities but no photographs were taken.
